##Run 3

Read in the csv files, add columns for data exploration grouping, and bind all csv's to the main data set, "alldata_run3"
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
low_err_5 <- read_csv(file=file.path(here(),"/Results/discussion_runs/lowerror/run3/lowerr_5_run3.csv"))
mid_err_5 <- read_csv(file=file.path(here(),"/Results/discussion_runs/miderror/run3/miderr_5_run3.csv"))
high_err_5 <- read_csv(file=file.path(here(),"/Results/discussion_runs/higherror/run3/higherr_5_run3.csv"))

low_err_1 <- low_err_5 %>% 
  filter(year == 100) %>% 
  mutate(status = ifelse(f_ratio == 0, "closed", ifelse(b <= 1000, "over", "good"))) %>% 
  mutate(growth = ifelse(r_0 <= .3, "slow", ifelse(r_0 > .3 & r_0 <= .5, "medium", "fast"))) %>% 
  mutate(assess = "5")

mid_err_1 <- mid_err_5 %>% 
  filter(year == 100) %>% 
  mutate(status = ifelse(f_ratio == 0, "closed", ifelse(b <= 1000, "over", "good"))) %>%

  mutate(assess = "5")

  mutate(assess = "5")
```
